an10.84:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.84:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa paccassosum.
an10.84:2.2: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an10.84:2.3: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo samanuyunjati samanuggahati samanubhasati.
an10.84:2.4: So tathagatena va tathagatasavakena va jhayina samapattikusalena paracittakusalena paracittapariyayakusalena samanuyunjiyamano samanuggahiyamano samanubhasiyamano irinam apajjati vicinam apajjati anayam apajjati byasanam apajjati anayabyasanam apajjati.
an10.84:3.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca manasi karoti:
an10.84:3.3: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti?
an10.84:4.1: Tamenam tathagato va tathagatasavako va jhayi samapattikusalo paracittakusalo paracittapariyayakusalo evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanati:
an10.84:5.3: Kodhapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:6.3: Upanahapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:7.3: Makkhapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:8.3: Palasapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:9.3: Issapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:10.3: Maccherapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:11.3: Satheyyapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:12.3: Mayapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:13.3: Icchapariyutthanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam.
an10.84:14.1: Sati kho pana ayamayasma uttari karaniye oramattakena visesadhigamena antara vosanam apanno.
an10.84:14.2: Antara vosanagamanam kho pana tathagatappavedite dhammavinaye parihanametam’.
an10.84:15.1: So vatavuso, bhikkhu ‘ime dasa dhamme appahaya imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an10.84:15.2: So vatavuso, bhikkhu ‘ime dasa dhamme pahaya imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissati’ti thanametam vijjati”ti.
